definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)

sentences.english: Trojan is finding itself at the center of a controversy in Wisconsin.
sentences.chinese: 特洛伊公司现在成了威斯康星州争论的中心。

sentences.english: Aphrodite was the goddess who triggered the Trojan War.
sentences.chinese: 阿佛罗狄忒是引发特洛伊战争的女神。

sentences.english: Dany knew enough of Westerosi history to know that.
sentences.chinese: 丹妮所知的维斯特洛伊历史使她足以知晓那点。

sentences.english: Last night the talk here was all of Westeros.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚这里的留言全是关于维斯特洛伊的。

sentences.english: None of the Trojan weapons was able to hurt Achilles.
sentences.chinese: 特洛伊人的任何武器都无法伤害阿奇里斯。

sentences.english: Troy was besieged by the Greeks for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 特洛伊城被希腊人围困了10年。

sentences.english: Gabby : I'm not interested in what you think you're doing for Troy.
sentences.chinese: 你以为你对特洛伊怎么样，不关我的事。

sentences.english: "Dragons, " Moqorro said in the Common Tongue of Westeros.
sentences.chinese: “龙们，”莫阔罗用维斯特洛伊通用语说。

sentences.english: An ancient city of northwest Asia Minor near the Dardanelles River.
sentences.chinese: 特洛伊小亚细亚西北一古城，位于达达尼尔河附近。

sentences.english: Schliemann excavated the ancient city of Troy.
sentences.chinese: 谢里曼挖掘出特洛伊古城。

sentences.english: And so the Trojans dragged it into the city with ropes.
sentences.chinese: 所以特洛伊人用粗绳拉它进城。

sentences.english: He traveled to all the Free Cities, and Westeros as well.
sentences.chinese: 他游历过所有的自由城邦和维斯特洛伊大陆。

sentences.english: The Dothraki are not fond of towns, you will know this even in Westeros.
sentences.chinese: 你在维斯特洛伊也该知道多斯拉克人对城镇没有兴趣。

sentences.english: He was killed by his wifer Clytemnestra upon his return form Troy.
sentences.chinese: 他刚从特洛伊返回家就被其妻克吕泰涅斯特拉杀死。

sentences.english: Live or die, Troy. Make your choice.
Troy was glad to take the horse as the spoils go to town.
sentences.chinese: 特洛伊人高兴地把木马当作战利品抬进城去。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
Achilles (or Akhilleus or Achilleus), son of Thetis and Peleus, Greek hero central to the Iliad
